text: Ronald is a masculine given name. The pronunciation of the name is [ ron-ld ]. Ronald is a name of Scottish origin, derived from the Old Norse name RÃ¶gnvaldr, which means "ruler's advisor" or "mighty counselor." The name has been in use since the Middle Ages and has been popularized by various historical figures, including kings, saints, and famous athletes. This name was ranked #563 on the US Popular Names in 2021. Other common forms are Ron, Ronny and Ronnie. == Famous Ronalds == * Ronald Reagan, 40th President of the United States * Ronald Ross, British medical doctor * Ronald Coase, British economist * Ron Paul, American politician * Ronnie Biggs, British criminal * Ronnie Wood, English musician and singer * Ronnie Barker, English comedian * Ronald Fisher, British statistician, evolutionary biologist and geneticist * Ronaldo de Assis Moreira, Brazilian association football player ==References== Category:Given names
title: Ronald
